minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I understand your worries about our financial situation...

minutes.speaker: Dr. Krishnan Vasanth
minutes.text: Have you considered a backup plan?. You've been working 80-hour weeks for months. This is affecting your health and our relationship.

minutes.speaker: Lakshmi Vasanth
minutes.text: Your health is more important. What happens to our home loan and savings if this doesn't work out?

minutes.speaker: Meera Vasanth
minutes.text: What about our savings?. I'm worried about the stress you're under. Can you at least take Sundays off?

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: Give me three more months. If we don't see progress, I'll reconsider.

minutes.speaker: Lakshmi Vasanth
minutes.text: Your health is more important. The uncertainty is hard on all of us. Do you have a backup plan?

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I know the long hours are affecting us, but this round is critical for our future.

minutes.speaker: Lakshmi Vasanth
minutes.text: You look tired. I'm worried about the stress you're under. Can you at least take Sundays off?

action_items.task: Set boundaries for work hours and family time
